articles.title: Beijing Winter Olympics ‘diplomatic boycott’ pushed across West - South China Morning Post
articles.description: China hawks across Europe and North America lend their voices to the clamour for a boycott of the Winter Olympics, to be held in Beijing next February.

articles.title: US promises vaccines for Taiwan amid China row - Sydney Morning Herald
